reviewText:
Best worship - Ever
God Bless Don Moen he really led the Holy Spirit fell in the presence of this recording.
I read a review about picture and sound not good of this VHS. I can say the following.
I re-recorded this VHS on a dvd and enhanced the sound and picture.
The quality prior my sound and picture enhancement was already perfect, now imagine what I'm enjoying afterwards.
Don Moen, God bless you and blessed be anyone who buy this tape and praise the Lord. God is good all the TIME
I was pleasantly surprised with this one. Really nice to see happy, smiling, Don Moen singing upbeat songs and even dancing early on in the video. Very cool!

The music was great.  The tape was a recording of a live concert performed 13 years ago.  Thus, the video was created with very old and probably not the best technology.  Often, the picture quality was not very sharp and the colors were off.
